objects.description: [reGeorg](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S1187) is a web shell that has been installed on exposed web servers for access to victim environments.(Citation: Mandiant APT29 Eye Spy Email Nov 22)(Citation: Cadet Blizzard emerges as novel threat actor)
